Title: My Links Menu for SharePoint 2010
Description: This control closely mimics the "My Links" menu from SharePoint 2007. In addition to listing a user's My Links and site memberships, it can also leverage SharePoint search to display a list of all sites the user has access to. Please see the documentation for installation instructions and for more information about using the search functionality.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This control closely mimics the "My Links" menu from SharePoint 2007. In addition to listing a user's My Links and site memberships, it can also leverage SharePoint search to display a list of all sites the user has access to. Please see the documentation for installation instructions and for more information about using the search functionality.
